name: The RPG Apocalyptic 2000s characters
description:
It's the Apocalypse; everything ended but wait, there are still some heroes and villains in what remains of the world and their story is just about to begin as everybody else's has ended, that's the subject of this art style. This model is trained on RPG illustrations featuring pencil shading and ink outlines. It's the typical drawing style used in less stylised illustrations of the late 1990s and early 2000's which were employed by medium budget RPG's.

it performs rather well for generating character images and illustrations for player characters and NPC's in the context of their immediate environment.

the trigger word to invoke is: TheRPGCharGenEsAFArt

this is a link to a list of concepts sorted by name

meta.prompt: TheRPGCharGenEsAFArt  ((epic warrior punk girl and man)) standing on a destroyed tower,  rising out of the smoke destroyed in the far distance ((sci-fi skyline))
meta.negativePrompt: bad anatomy, bad hands, out of frame
